title: Combat Log Statistics (CLS)
author: zeakfury
description:
[CENTER][b][SIZE="4"][COLOR="Green"]Combat Log Statistics (CLS)[/COLOR][/SIZE][/b][/CENTER]

Based on the [URL="http://tamrielfoundry.com/"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Foundry Tactical Combat[/COLOR][/URL] addon made by Atropos. CLS displays current combat in a separate window. It should be used as a tool to help form strategies in-game. 

[b][COLOR="green"]Included[/COLOR][/b]
[LIST=1]
[*]Combat Log
[*]Real-Time DPS/HPS Window, with "Copy to Chat" button
[*]What Happened to Me? Log
[*]Attack Abilities Used with Stats (click the number in the box)
[*]Healing Abilities Used with Stats (click the number in the box)
[*]Life-Time Stats
[*]Many Settings
[/LIST]
(Look at pictures for more details)

[b][COLOR="green"]Navigation[/COLOR][/b]
[LIST]
[*][I]"/CLS"[/I] or[I] "/CLS help"[/I] will bring up all options in game
[*][I]"/CLS Main"[/I] will show the Main Combat Log Window
[*][I]"/CLS DPS"[/I] will show the DPS Window
[*]Under the Game Menu (ESC), Under Settings => Addon Settings, there is "CLS"
[*]Also view the combat log in the first chat window, a chat window of its own, both, or neither
[/LIST]

[B][COLOR="Green"]To Do:[/COLOR][/B]
[LIST=1]
[*]More UI Options
[*]More Analysis
[/LIST]
changeLog:
V3.0.5:
- Added Max Crit Damage and Heal to lifetime stats
- Added non-damage/healing combat effects to log (interrupts, stuns, roots, etc.)
- updated to API version 100011.

V3.0.4:
- Added a button to DPS window to copy its contents to the chat input box.
- Added menu options to reset the window positions, and to lock the windows in place.
- Restricted windows to the game screen, so they don't go flying away

V3.0.3:
- Fixed a bug when displaying the Attacks/Heals window, where an error would happen if there were more recorded attacks/heals than lines to display them. It now only displays the top attacks/heals.
- Fixed a problem with resized windows not recording their new size properly.

V3.0.2a:
- Fixed an error in the manifest file. Oops!

V3.0.2:
- Re-added XP gain display for veteran-ranked players, since vet ranks are now determined by
XP instead of VP.
- Fixed bug where DPS meter was showing when the compass was hidden, i.e. in Inventory display
- New options to fade the main window text and the DPS meter, independent of each other and of
the main window background. All fades use the same timer.
- Works with Update 5.

V3.0.1:
- Fixed a problem where the windows would appear on character load, regardless of settings.
- Made the menu "Reset to Defaults" button work properly.

V3.0:
- Continuation of the code refactor. You (hopefully) shouldn't notice much difference in functionality.
- Made some tweaks to the menu.
- Added a keybinding to toggle the DPS meter.
- Updated to API 100009 (Update 4).

V2.1.1:
Import changes from CLS Easy-as-1.2.3 Edition

V1.11_Update:
Fixed Stupid Mistake (Crit Spam in Chatbox)

V1.11:
Split ChatTab Option into new Addon CLSChatTab (dependent on ChatTab Manager and CLS)
Added Fade Window option
Added Buff Tracking Toggle
Fixed so works with Reticle Settings (not tested)
Fixed Skill Line XP Gains
Fixed so no longer shows in ESC menu

V1.10_Update:
Forgot to remove Debugging Code (fixed)

V1.10:
Fixed Vamp/WW Skill XP Error
Added Emperor Skill XP
Fixed Skill XP initial wrong amounts
Added Option to Hook Main Window to Chat Tab 
Added Option to fade with Chat Tab (inherits current fade settings for ChatWindow) 
Added Option to set time to fade after combat ends
Added Buffer for DPS Window Update w/ Option to turn off
Added Option to set buffer time delay
Changed the Attack and Heal tabs when in "UP" mode to display correctly
Added ability to scroll Attack and Heal tabs
Added Main and DPS toggle show/hide buttons to Settings (just incase)
Fixed bug that made it so you couldn't disable addon

Known bugs:
The Horizontal Slider does not work atm.

V1.05:
Fixed bugs
Added Tracking of skill line experience
Added Options to turn this tracking on or off.

V1.04:
Bunch of fixes
Added Settings to Game Menu under Settings>"CLS Settings"
Added UP and DOWN direction for text (default is Down)
Added LT tab which gives you Life-Time Stats
Removed TimeStamp button (Now in Game Menu Settings)

V1.03:
Fixed Hiding when in Menu Screen and Talking to NPCs

V1.02:
Fixed Launch Day Bugs

V1.01:
Changed Paul Sage Phrase to normal "You were hit for x Damage"
Added message to the "/CLS" display.

V1.0:
Changed Name of Addon
Removed old Group Tabs
Added new Attack and Heal tabs that show statistics on abilities used
Added Font Size Slider
Added Output to Chat Box
Added Hide when in Menu (use "." to get cursor to switch tabs)
Added Wykkyd Easter Egg 

V0.3:
Fixed for new patch. 
No Group DPS/%Damage (although can still get breakdown of your abilities from there)
No Group HPS/%Healing  (although can still get breakdown of your abilities from there)
No Death Recap

Added Healing done to you in Group HPS

Everything else works to a certain degree.

V0.22:
Added Experience and Alliance Point Gains
Added buttons to turn off Color Categories in the Settings Window
Added button to change the color and alpha of the background
Added toggle buttons to turn on and off Power Gains, Experience Gains, Alliance Point Gains
Added button to toggle always show combat log background.

Fixed scroll bar on Death Recap and Ability Breakdown windows.

title: Friend Removed Notification
author: CaptainBlagbird
description:
[SIZE="3"][B][COLOR="DA8A00"]Description[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[INDENT]Adds notification when a player was removed from the friends list.[/INDENT]

[SIZE="3"][B][COLOR="DA8A00"]Features[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*]Also displays a notification on start when a friend was removed while the local player was offline.
[*]Languages supported: English / German / French
[/LIST]

[SIZE="3"][B][COLOR="DA8A00"]Requirements[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[INDENT]To be able to use this add-on you'll need to install this library too:
[LIST]
[*][URL="https://www.esoui.com/downloads/info1224"]LibNotifications[/URL]
[/LIST][/INDENT]
changeLog:
[SIZE="4"]v2.01[/SIZE] [COLOR="DimGray"](2020-5-28)[/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]Bugfix (missed reference to Inv Insight after copy/paste
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"]v2.00[/SIZE] [COLOR="DimGray"](2020-5-27)[/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]Separated data between NA/EU servers so notices won't appear when you switch servers
[*]API version updated
[*]It will associate your current friend list to whatever server you log onto first
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"]v1.1[/SIZE] [COLOR="DimGray"](partially released: v1.0.14)[/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]API update
[*]Bug fixes
[*]Notification will still be there after relog/reloadui
[*]Removed libraries (have to be installed manually by the user)
[*]Added German and French translation
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"]v1.0[/SIZE] [COLOR="DimGray"](2015-11-05)[/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]First version
[/LIST]

---

Can also be found on [URL="https://github.com/CaptainBlagbird/ESO_FriendRemovedNotification/releases"]GitHub[/URL]

title: Craft Bag Monitor (CBM)
author: Fonkin
description:
[LEFT][IMG]https://image.ibb.co/cUtg5z/Craft_Bag.png[/IMG][SIZE=3]Craft Bag Monitor (CBM)[/SIZE][B] - Track items that are sent to your Craft Bag including their value.[/B]
[/LEFT]
 
Have you ever wondered how many items went to your craft bag and how much they were worth after:[LIST]
[*]a dungeon/delve run
[*]accepting hireling resource deliveries
[*]daily writ rewards
[*]deconning items
[*]resource farming[/LIST]Wonder no more! CBM is a command line tool that will answer all those questions and more.

CBM will also tell you how much in gold you've collected since the last time you checked using the /cbml command.  It's a fast easy way to figure how much gold a specific action netted you.  To use: just before you hit that node, decon that item or tap that delivery girl, type /cbml to get a current report since the last reset.  Perform the action and then rerun /cbml to find out how much your Craft Bag increased in value from the drops.

If you have Master Merchant active, CBM will calculate the item's individual and combined worth as well as a grand total of all items collected.


Craft Bag Monitor - Usage:
   /cbm - show this help menu
   /cmbl - lists items collected since last reset w/summary
   /cbms - summary only since last reset
   /cmbr - resets list of collected craftbag items

[B]DEVELOPERS:[/B] I welcome translations.  Just submit the translated .lua file.
changeLog:
[b]v1.21[/b]
[list]
[*] Version: Updated add-on for Murkmire.
[/list]

[b]v1.2[/b]
[list]
[*] Enhancement: Added new switch /cbms - Summary only since last reset.
[/list]

[b]v1.1[/b]
[list]
[*] Enhancement: Reports delta gold value between the last time checked and current.
[/list]

[b]v1.02[/b]
[list]
[*] Enhancement: Now reports version number in info screen. /cmb  Thanks Pkodyssey for suggestion.
[*] Enhancement: Initializes bag upon first use of /cbml if /cbmr hadn't been used.
[/list]

[b]v1.01[/b]

[list]
[*]Bug Fix: Not reporting correct amount of loot collected if stack was over 200.  Thanks to RavenMind for discovering and reporting this.
[/list]

[b]v1.0[/b]

[list]
[*]Original release.
[/list]
